cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.path // empty' | tr '\n' '\0' | xargs -0 -I {} npx claude-flow@alpha hooks post-edit --file '{}' --format true --update-memory true

/bin/bash -c 'FILE=$(cat | jq -r ".tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.path // empty"); echo "‚úÖ POST-IMPLEMENTATION VERIFICATION:"; echo "üîç Critical checks:"; echo "   ‚Ä¢ Is the implementation COMPLETE and FUNCTIONAL?"; echo "   ‚Ä¢ Are there any TODO/FIXME comments left?"; echo "   ‚Ä¢ Does it handle edge cases and errors?"; echo "   ‚Ä¢ Is it connected to real services (not mocked)?"; if echo "$FILE" | grep -qE "\.(ts|js|tsx|jsx)$" && ! echo "$FILE" | grep -qE "(test|spec|mock)"; then echo "‚ö° Production code modified - verify:"; echo "   ‚Ä¢ No console.log() statements (unless needed)"; echo "   ‚Ä¢ No hardcoded secrets/credentials"; echo "   ‚Ä¢ Proper async/await handling"; echo "   ‚Ä¢ Real API endpoints (not localhost unless dev)"; fi'
